sys_script.name: Αναθεωρηση απο record producer

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_dc900062875b7c5005ec65750cbb35b0
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_epats_qhs_qhs_policy</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_epats_qhs_qhs_policy">u_policies_qhsISNOTEMPTY^EQ<item endquery="false" field="u_policies_qhs" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Αναθεωρηση απο record producer</name><order>1</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	var gr = new GlideRecord('x_epats_qhs_qhs_policy');
	gr.addQuery('sys_id', current.u_policies_qhs);
	gr.query();
	
	if (gr.next()){
		gr.setValue('u_journal_2', 'Αναθεώρηση εγγράφου');
		gr.setValue('assigned_to',gr.getValue('sys_created_by'));
		gr.setValue('procedure_2','update');
		gr.setValue('state','draft');
		//gr.setValue('sys_created_by',gs.getUserID());
		gr.setValue('u_policies_qhs',current.sys_id);
		gr.update();
	}
	
	current.deleteRecord();
	

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>alex</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-10-22 07:33:47</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>dc900062875b7c5005ec65750cbb35b0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Αναθεωρηση απο record producer</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="QHS" source="x_epats_qhs">7031c0461be6f050aa2b4371b24bcb49</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="QHS">7031c0461be6f050aa2b4371b24bcb49</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_dc900062875b7c5005ec65750cbb35b0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>alex</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-10-22 08:06:50</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=dc900062875b7c5005ec65750cbb35b0"/></record_update>
